title: LagerLV
author: LagerLV
content: Hey.I've been a customer of Nitrogensports for some time and overall been satisfied with them, but in March of this year i received a ban from the website for supposedly "use of bots and overall betting behavior in your account", whatever that even means. https://i.ibb.co/B6ZXNYK/1.pngWhat i assume caused them to ban my account was betting multiple bets of the same kind on the same outcome, which to my knowledge and going through the TOS isn't against the site rules.Okay, so they banned my account and reset my balance to 0, but then over the time i've accumulated some money through my affiliate earnings which they refuse to pay me out as well. https://i.ibb.co/zb4yrky/2.png

comments.body: Yeah, the story from their side is that they were not okay with me placing multiple bets of the same kind on the same outcome https://i.ibb.co/7R6hC0C/3.pngAnd i have deposited there, a lot, over 50+ transaction for sure, but they migrated to Nitrobetting yesterday and now you are unable to see the deposits and withdraws on Nitrogensports.I am okay with them banning my account and zeroing the balance, but i've accumulated a fair share of money only from affiliates and i am not able to withdraw those.

comments.body: What were you doing all these months since March and suddenly now complaining about the casino?If you have been banned, there's a reason for that. Since you have been banned, you are unlikely to get an affiliate commission. You have been banned from their site, of course, no ban in any casino means a partial ban. It's a fool to expect to get an affiliate commission. You are no more eligible for that since you are banned.However, as said above, if you have made an initial deposit, you may get the deposit back but for that you have clarify everything and of course, we need the nitrobetting part of the story.
